resources.string: Levelizer is running; tap to stop
Levelizer gives you haptic feedback when you\'re attempting to take an unlevel photo.\n\nThis accessibility service is used to react when a whitelisted camera app is opened.
Levelizer is an open source Android app that gives you haptic feedback when you\'re attempting to take an unlevel photo.
Levelizer needs Accesibility permission to work. Please enable it now.
Is Levelizer not working with your camera app? Add it to the whitelist.
Add camera apps to the whitelist to make sure Levelizer works with them.
Curious which camera apps are supported by Levelizer?
